name: Bookbinder
description: A craftsman who creates and repairs books; adventurers can commission custom spellbooks, repair damaged tomes, or learn bookbinding secrets.
atmosphere: The workshop is filled with the rich scent of leather, glue, and fresh parchment. The sound of tools working on leather and the gentle rustle of paper creates a peaceful, methodical rhythm. Stacks of materials and half-finished books line the workbenches, while the air carries the promise of knowledge being preserved and created.
